Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace HyperCasualRunner

Classes

BattleArea

Battle Area that is spawned when battle begins, for games like Count Masters

BattleAreaTrigger

BlinkFeedback

Collectable

It gathers all possible CollectableEffects and applies them when PopulationManagerBase contacts with Collectable's collider. You can use multiple effects and all of them would be applied to the PopulationManagerBase.

CollectableChoice

If you want to have multiple collectables but one of them can be chosen. Others are disabled.

Damageable

Damage sources like Projectiles attacks this. It contains health and if it falls below 0, it dies. Class itself is extensible by allowing you to bind other methods using UnityEvents.

DOTweenInitializer

FrameRateSetter

JumpTrigger

Use this to trigger jump for PopulatedEntities.

OrganizeTrigger

Use this to trigger organizing of CrowdManager manually.

Player

Brain of the player object, it acts like a composition root for other components like RunnerMover, PopulationManagerBase.

Projectile

Projectile Pool spawns this, ProjectileShooterModifier uses this to shoot Projectile. It contains damage and speed of the projectiles.

ProjectileShooter

ProjectileShooterModifiable uses this class for picking right Projectile for the active PopulatedEntity. Use this when you have multiple gameObjects (like playerLevel1, playerLevel2) and everyone of them shoots different projectile. You can see the example in Crowd Evolution demo scene.

TransformationSingle

Transforms TransformationModifiable one by one, just like cup filling coffee machines in Coffee Stack game

UIJoystick

It's a general purpose joystick.

Structs

HitDamageInfo

Enums

BattleResult
